alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 09 at 8:47PM PST until February 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. In the canyons, foothills, and below the mountain passes, isolated gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino, Riverside, and San Diego County Mountains, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, San Diego County Valleys, and Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
